What to Clean Toilet Bowl With to Remove Stains and Buildup
More from Clorox experts
Make toilet cleaning a breeze with our all-in-one system.
Use as directed.
Wondering
how to use toilet bowl cleaner?
Whether it’s routine cleaning with a toilet brush, tablets for the tank, or an easy-to-use toilet wand, Clorox is here to help you find the
best toilet cleaner
for your needs. Follow these steps to clean
stained, rusty, smelly,
or
dirty toilet bowls.
Here’s how to use a manual toilet bowl cleaner to help keep that bowl looking its best:
Prepare the toilet. Flush toilet bowl before cleaning and preclean visibly soiled surfaces.
Apply toilet cleaner. Follow the instructions for your chosen cleaning solution.
Brush the toilet bowl. Be sure to scrub above the water line for best results.
Flush when finished. Repeat for tough stains.

An important safety message
Bleach and other disinfectants are not suitable for consumption or injection under any circumstances. People should always read the label for proper usage instructions. Disinfecting surfaces with bleach and the disinfecting products is one of the ways to help stop the spread of COVID-19, according to the Centers for Disease Control. Our products are safe when used as directed. It’s critical that everyone understands the facts in order to keep themselves safe and healthy.
